title: Blogs of Calligraphy / Typography
content:
Hi there!  
I’m interted on that wave of blogs around and we can already find some nice ones.  
I lost some of them during the time but... here we are to get the nice ones again.

[http://typeneu.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013333/http:/typeneu.com/)  
 [http://scribblers.biz](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013333/http:/scribblers.biz/)  
 [http://ilovetypography.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013333/http:/ilovetypography.com/)

[http://blog.iso50.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013333/http:/blog.iso50.com/)  
 [http://ffffound.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013333/http:/ffffound.com/)

Ok i found some nice blogs about other stuff and posted them too ehehe... and as i said... lost some...

 [‹ Diagraph or Stencil Machine](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013333/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45017 "Go to previous forum topic") [Old Extended Globe Logos... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013333/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47581 "Go to next forum topic")
author: joelsantos

comments.content:
Hi Joel,  
have a look:  
 [Blogs](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013333/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Blogs)  
 [Typophiles’ Blogs](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122013333/http:/typophile.com/blog)  
F

nice florian, didn’t noticed it yet. i’ll give it a shot i never liked much blogs but when i found out RSS on my “mail” software geez... ehehe

Joel Santos // youremin  
sound & visual
